Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY LIVING ON OVER 1 ACRE!
Located on the fringe of Emerald & surrounded by luxury lifestyle properties this beautifully presented family home enjoys sealed road access, rural & bushland views, public transport nearby plus easy access to many great walking trails including Emerald Lake Park & Wright forest. Boasting 5 bedrooms, 4 separate living areas & 3 bathrooms, you can be sure the whole family will love living here! Your comfort & luxury is ensured with high ceilings, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, crackling wood fire plus there is an above ground pool with solar heating ready for another summer of fun to be shared with family & friends. Set on over 1 acre of almost flat land complete with established low maintenance gardens, plenty of lawn areas for the kids & pets to enjoy, heaps of parking space plus there is a huge shed which has concrete floor, power & remote door this property really has it all!!! Perfectly presented & ready to welcome & new family to a wonderful lifestyle, dont miss out on this great location, call us & inspect today!
Insights: 49 Bailey Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2020 and 7 other 5 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Live and Work On Your Own Hobby Farm!
Offered for sale for the first time this glorious 6 acre poultry farm featuring a very large and comfortable 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home with dual accommodation option. This home will accommodate the busiest of families and all their hobbies.
This 'out of contract' poultry farm features 4 poultry sheds that are fully equipped with feeders, drinkers, silos and everything you need to begin your next venture - whatever that may be. In fact this farm can lend itself to so many possibilities - poultry, eggs, hydroponics, storage for all your luxury cars and toys or an indoor arena and stables maybe - you are only limited by your imagination.
There are numerous out houses and sundry shedding, 2 x dams, car accommodation and the property is fully fenced with extensive established gardens.
The shed measurements are:
Shed 1 - 950m2
Shed 2 - 900m2
Shed 3 - 800m2
Shed 4 - 900m2
The grand 3 bedroom home will suit any large family offering separate living/dining room with stunning views, that is large enough for all the family and friends to gather and a large kitchen to cook up the feast. Other features include gas cooking, gas ducted heating, a huge gas fire place, robes in all bedrooms, 2 with ensuites, the laundry which also features a utility room for those muddy/rainy days, 5kW of solar perfectly positioned to capture every ounce of sun to help with the bills and a sensational deck to relax and take in your peaceful surrounds.
A fully self contained separate managers quarters/granny flat is detached from the main house only by a double lock up garage - perfect for that extended family, teenagers or time-out cave. In fact there is enough room under the home for a further rumpus room or more bedrooms if you need.
Inspection is a must - be quick because this property will not last long.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Lucy Crehan 0410 503 968 Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Charming Family Home with Space To Play!
Situated high on a lovely ¾ acre allotment is this delightful brick and weatherboard family home.
Abounding in character, this charming home is set over two levels and features soaring cathedral ceilings, dado wood panelling and timber lined ceilings.
Downstairs the main living zone comprises of an impressive family room with high cathedral ceiling and windows on all three sides allowing natural light to flood in while taking in the views from all angles. This area connects seamlessly with the country style timber kitchen with dishwasher and ample bench space and family meals area. Glass doors allow this area to open out to the deck that wraps around this home allowing for easy entertaining with friends and family.
The lower level also contains the Master bedroom complete with walk in robe, full ensuite with spa bath and a private Juliette balcony. The large study on this level could easily be converted to a 5th bedroom.
Upstairs the area is well utilised with three bedrooms, large rumpus room and a wonderful area off one of the bedrooms which would be perfect for a reading room, music room or kids play area. The deck from this level provides sensational views of the rear yard and the tree tops surrounding this property. Enjoy the serenity of this private location where the songs of the Kookaburras occasionally breaks the silence.
The clear and usable spacious block is fully fenced and provides the perfect place for kids and pets to play safely.
For more space there is a room under the home ideal as a gym room, workshop, studio or office. With a double carport, water tank storage with pumps, underhouse storage with concrete floor and gas ducted heating, this home is an appealing package that will not last!
Bethany Day 0438 844 968 Aaron Day 0407 365 994

Description:
Cheerful, Light and Bright.
Situated in a very private location this pretty property offers the perfect escape for those looking to make the most of the beauty that the hills has to offer. Surrounded by leafy established trees including tall rhododendrons and camellias, the home features three bedrooms, with the master and ensuite positioned for privacy to one end of the home and the additional two bedrooms to the other end. The living room offers plenty of space and is warmed by a cosy Coonara heater and has a split system for year round comfort. The kitchen is light and bright with a meals area adjoining and has a great outlook over the rear yard. Outside you will discover a very family friendly, fully fenced rear garden, and there is also a bungalow which would make a great home office or is ideally suited to a work from home space or could serve as an additional bedroom. With a garden shed, covered area idea for outdoor entertaining, excellent under home space for storage, this property is sure to be in demand and will be an ideal first home, downsizer or investment property. All within easy reach of the town, sporting facilities, kindergarten and Primary School.

Description:
UNDER CONSTRUCTION COMPLETION NOV 2019
Boutique Build
LOCATION LIFESTYLE & ALL BRAND NEW
Colonial federation meets modern styling in this high calibre, elegant new home. Set on 1009 m2, in a peaceful location, this sophisticated design boasts exacting finishes and absolute attention to detail.
The floor plan brilliantly integrates the main living zones while dividing the master-suite (complete with large WIR and ensuite), from the other three generously-sized bedrooms with hidden WIR. The study nook is ideal for those who work from home or for homework (sorry kids!), while the family, lounge and rumpus room provide extra space for growing families.
The kitchen showcases stone bench tops, large island bench/breakfast bar, 900mm stainless steel free standing cooker and Butler's pantry with additional walk-in pantry. The refined design and clever practical features such as: a serving window from the butler's pantry, outdoor entertaining deck, LED down-lights and stone bench tops throughout, double-glazing throughout, are evidence of the uncompromising quality. Simply everything has been considered to provide you with the lifestyle you always imagined.
Conveniently located close to sports facilities in up and coming township of Cockatoo with school bus network & public bus service a short walk away. Emerald & Gembrook (both approx. 8-10 mins drive) and Pakenham (approx. 20 mins drive) are an easy drive.
Final costs, dimensions and inclusions may vary from the information provided and may be varied at any time.
**Payment terms: 10% on Signing of Contract. Balance on Certificate of Occupancy. Estimated time of completion Nov 2019.
Contact Agent on 0428 744 498. Katie will help you secure your dream.
Internal area
321m²

Description:
Tranquil Family Home In the Cockatoo Hills
Behind an avenue brimming with mature tree ferns, you will find this solid family home. Settled on half an acre (approx.) amongst peace and tranquility, this spacious split level house enjoys views over the treetops from the front balcony. The driveway thoughtfully retained using large Castlemaine stone, is just off the sealed end of Mountain Road. The property seemingly built to soak up the sights and sounds of the local birdlife.
The main living area features a cathedral ceiling and grand windows, lighting the two spacious living areas; one sunken and one mezzanine, both warmed by a gas fire and ducted heating. The large kitchen gleams with mirrored splashbacks and tiled benchtops. The size of this kitchen will make cooking effortless. The sleek black tiled floor leads through to the separate dining area as well as the contemporised laundry.
The master suite hosts a large WIR and behind a sliding barn door; a beautifully updated ensuite with twin basins and shower. It also opens onto the balcony, as does the 2nd double room with BIR. The third bedroom enjoys the light and views of the rear garden. The family bathroom has also been remodeled with a large shower and deep bath to relax in.
Stairs lead down to the lower level of the house where you will find the study with its own entrance making it ideal for home office or business space or home gym. There is also a two-car garage.
The addition of some decking to the side of the house joining the balcony could really open up the professionally terraced garden to entertaining.
Transform this house into your own with some thoughtful personal touches.

Description:
Everything laid at your feet!
This lovely 2 storey home sits just above Cockatoo village offering you the opportunity to leave the car behind and walk to everything. It is just minutes away from the main street, the Primary School and the brand new IGA.
The wraparound decking with views across Cockatoo is the prize of this house. The entertaining section is ready to host Christmas or an intimate party watching the colours change across the sunset sky and comes complete with separate BBQ area.
The welcoming kitchen is ready for action with generous space, a beautiful outlook and doors opening onto the deck. The meals area is airy with a feature wall of a magnetic chalkboard ensuring you wont forget what day the spelling test is, show and tell, or your shopping list!
At the top of the house sits the parents retreat, a wonderful private space replete with a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite. The queen bedroom has BIR and the single has floor to ceiling bookcases across two walls and BIR. The bright living area is warmed by both wood-fired heating and ducted. It has a recently renovated family bathroom with massive amounts of storage in two linen closets and laundry.
The half-acre block has an abundance of native plants with many fine mature tree ferns, shedding and loads of room for the children to play amongst the eucalypts.
Come and join the party at the open day or call Katie for a private function on 0428 744 498.

Description:
Style and sanctuary on high
Stepping into the gardens of this stylish home it is hard to suppress the desire to swing in the hammock beneath the magnificent dragon sapphire tree. If you can resist you will find a sanctuary from the world on ½ an acre.
With a palette informed by the surrounding bushland, the design of this home reflects the beauty of the natural elements. Sink into the sunken lounge and watch the seasons change through the picture windows. Enjoy warm days on the front veranda or warming yourself in front of the panoramic wood-fired heater, watching the light change the colour of the Sydney Blue Gum hardwood floor.
In this haven for the style-conscious, the kitchen is it! Ready to create gourmet delights whilst simultaneously feeding your desire for beauty. Detail is everywhere: the slate floor, the pressed metal island, the reclaimed blackwood bench and the exquisite individual Italian tiles in eucalypt green. The dining area connects the light-filled open plan living areas. Two double bedrooms have BIR and the master suite has a walk-in robe and opens onto the front veranda with views across to the Yarra Ranges.
The evocative bathroom features elegant Roger Sellar copper rose fittings and a handmade stone sink, plus a delicate freestanding bath nestled into the bay window sits on a travertine stone floor. The showers floor-to-ceiling one-way mirrored window offers you fine views as you wash your cares away.
The gardens host a two-car garage and terraced veggie patch, topped by a fantastic entertaining area with magnificent outlooks, ready for an evening of cocktails around the fire pit.
Make time to discover all this home has to offer.

Description:
RENOVATED HOME! FLAT LAND! HUGE SHED!
This fully renovated home sits proudly on a ½ acre double allotment that is flat, sunny and fully accessible which are all too rare in the hills.
Step inside and this house will impress those that love to entertain. The designer galley kitchen is perfect down to the last detail. The soft palette of the custom cabinets & stone benchtops, provincial style handles, quality stainless appliances, and stunning glass splashback that lights up or dims with a no-touch hand gesture. The dining room off the kitchen will host many family feasts and open the double doors at the end of the galley to entertain in the covered and paved alfresco area.
Theres lots of room for living too. Youll get cosy in the sunken lounge watching Netflix by the open fireplace or read a book in the sunny family room. Upstairs youll find the huge master suite complete with walk-in robe, ensuite with freestanding bath and balcony that captures the morning sun. Theres also the 4th bedroom/study upstairs with flexibility to make it a retreat or a nursery.
The home is boasts fresh floor tiles in the living areas, plush new carpets in the bedrooms and sunken lounge, new window shutters, fresh paint and fixtures throughout. All this is kept perfectly climate controlled with three reverse cycle split systems and ducted gas heating.
Outside, youll enjoy the private sunny lawns, fully fenced yard, mature landscaped gardens and the ambiance of a fishpond and lighting by the alfresco area. Theres a massive 3 car shed and workshop out the back that has a 2.8m clearance plus I beam and block & tackle for the car enthusiast, and another double garage with electric lift door and internal access to the house. The double width driveway and circular drive makes parking cars and trailers a breeze.
So, if youre an entertainer, tradie with a heap of tools and toys, or an empty-nester looking for the ideal base to park your caravan and tow rig, you wont need to look any further, this is perfect in every way. Located within walking distance to Cockatoos growing town centre with shops, cafés, doctors and a new IGA Supermarket. Contact Mat Fitch 0473 363 606 or Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 to arrange your inspection today.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
Kalimna - A Beautiful Place
A fully renovated 1890s Victorian weatherboard home originally from Surrey Hills re-imagined on a stunning 6 acre plus bush setting on the edge of Cockatoo & Gembrook.
The 4 bedroom home has 3 bathrooms and lovingly retains many original features such as the 11 ft ceilings, fretwork, high skirts, ornate cornicing, ceiling detail and roses. State of the art double-glazed windows and doors through-out resonate with the character of the original.
The master bedroom with French doors on to the large Merbau deck keeps the original feature fireplace and continues through a his and hers robe into the luxe ensuite with large bath, walk-in shower and pedestal basin. The crisp sophisticated provincial style of the bathroom, the French pattern travertine flooring, the offset square tiles and light fittings are echoed in the second ensuite and main bathroom/laundry.
The guest suite has floor to ceiling cabinetry and tv recess. Accessed externally from the rear deck into the washroom, wc and shower space. Perfect for teenager, extended family or guests. The second bedroom is oversized and has a beautiful outlook onto the established garden bed beyond the double sash windows. At 4m x 4m this bedroom can easily accommodate 2 children or provide a second living zone if required.
All bedrooms are joined by a wide corridor with beautiful original fretwork that leads to the open plan living zone with feature oak herringbone flooring and coffered ceiling detail. A panoramic wood-fire sits on a large inset bluestone slab and pumps the heat into this sophisticated yet homely space.
A bespoke classic English galley kitchen lines the entirety of one wall and extends into the pantry with study nook. Painted deep blue cabinetry compliments the warmth of the oak flooring with double butlers sink, Miele dishwasher & dual fuel 1100mm Belling Richmond range cooker. Cook while wistfully taking in the bush setting viewed through the double glazed windows. Then join family or friends on the large deck to enjoy the sun setting through the trees.
A retained driveway brings you right to the impressive front entrance with deck and wrap around veranda. There is no shortage of parking for vehicles here or around the 10m x 8.3m American style barn. The beauty of the property can be glimpsed through the cypress tree-lined driveway as you approach from the Cockatoo to Gembrook cut-through that is the much loved Mountain Road with its stunning views towards Warburton Ranges & back towards Emerald.
A true lifestyle property to call home forever more.

Description:
HOME IS WHERE THE HEART.AND PARTY IS!!!
Rest assured all the days ahead will be thoroughly enjoyed here when you become the lucky purchaser who gets to call this place home! Full of character & with plenty of space for the growing family, this home has been lovingly designed to include plenty of options for separate living or for first class entertaining. Boasting 5 bedrooms all with BIRs, the large master retreat features WIR & full ensuite. There are 3 living areas plus separate dining room perfect for private dinner parties, art studio or work from home office. The rumpus room features double doors that lead to the verandah plus direct access to an entertainers paradise. Outdoor dining, lounging & living has never been more comfortable than from this huge space which features built in bars, room for lounges, BBQ & dining on a grand scale plus there are excellent quality custom made blinds, all of this is surrounded by the beauty of nature. You can honestly sit by the fire pit, roast marshmallows & tune into nothing but the sounds of the local wildlife & the rustle of the trees and forget about the fast pace life going on around you it truly is a tranquil setting! With timber floorboards, high ceilings, picture windows, gas ducted heating, wood fire plus there is a double garage, circular driveway & 3/4 of an acre to explore you can call off the search, this is the one you have been looking for!!!
Insights: 63 Second Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2019 and 7 other 5 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming, Stylish and Comfortable!
Situated on nearly 2/3 Acre, this beautifully presented home offers style, comfort and space for the whole family.
Featuring 3 very generously sized bedrooms all with robes, the Master bedroom has a study nook, walk in robe, a sizable full ensuite with bath and French doors that open out to the covered verandah.
This home has open plan living to maximise space and comfort. There is an expansive lounge area, dining area and adjacent modern kitchen. The chef of the family will love cooking up a storm in this kitchen complete with ample storage, stone bench tops, porcelain sink and quality SMEG oven/cooktop. French doors open out to the covered wide wrap around verandah which integrates the indoor living space to the outdoor.
The family bathroom and laundry are both generous in size to perfectly cater for the growing family.
Add to this polished floorboards, wood fire heater, gas ducted heating, 9 ceilings, contemporary square set cornice, instantaneous gas hot water and neutral tones throughout.
The features continue outside with wide wrap around verandah, double lock up garage with concrete floor, power and theatre setup, single carport, large chicken run, kids cubby house, landscaped gardens, vegetable beds, wood shed, 1.8kw solar power and fully fenced.
For those after stylish living this home is a must inspect!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Fantastic neat home!
If youre searching for a first home walking distance to Cockatoos township this property is the one for you. Enter the home under cover from the double carport into the large living space that features a separate dining room and opens out onto a huge undercover entertaining deck complete with cafe blinds. With 3 bedrooms, master with 4 robes, recently renovated family bathroom with separate toilet and a well-appointed kitchen featuring gas cook top, electric oven and gas ducted heating for those cooler evenings. Outdoors the home offers a lovely usable ¼ acre block with fully fenced yard for the kids and your four legged friends, also features a single lock up garage/workshop complete with concrete floor and driveway access for trailers and boats. This tidy brick veneer home is perfect for a first home buyer or tradesmen looking to utilize the backyard space. (This property is currently tenanted and we do not have access to inside photos shots although the property presents well).

Description:
Hillview Impresive family home on just under 1 acre.
Hillview is an impressive family home situated in a very peaceful environment on just under 1 acre of land. As you enter the property you are greeted by a large triple carport that has been built with integrity as well as a huge Garage with room for another 3 cars complete with concrete flooring and a expansive mezzanine. This Garage also currently includes a substantial bar and mancave space. Inside the home is just as impressive, with cathedral ceilings, abundant windows and light; formal lounge/dining with huge open fireplace; modern kitchen with new stainless steel appliances and large pantry; another informal lounge/living space with wood heater and split system; 3 large bedrooms with built in robes, the master with ensuite and walk in robe; and a separate toilet and main bathroom. The home has been beautifully styled and the character features including dado wall paneling, exposed brick and full-length verandas make it very warm and welcoming. It is conveniently located close to transport and local sporting clubs and the Main Street of Cockatoo. If you are looking for a beautiful home on an outstanding private block with envious shedding and garage then look no further. Call Rebecca Halit today!
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.

Description:
Cockatoo Estate
Luxe country farmhouse on 23.5 clear useable acres divided into 7 easy-to-work paddocks with quality electric fencing (as can be attested to by our mildly shocked photographer), stock yard, spring fed dam & 2 large machinery sheds. The perfect set up for your equine retreat or hobby farm.
The scene is set as you turn off the main road, through the gates and onto the remarkable Canadian Flame Tree lined driveway flanked by the two large front paddocks used for cutting hay annually yielding 70 rounds plus.
The property currently accommodates 8 head of cattle, 3 horses and 20 plus sheep with the recent addition of a dozen lambs.
Rarely have I seen such a beautiful acreage property so well set up and ready for the next lucky owners to hit the ground running. There is even a healthy crop of asparagus that typically takes 3 years to establish. The honest, robust yet luxuriously appointed 4 bedroom rendered brick home has a flexible floor plan. The hotel style kitchenette in the 2nd living space with cosy wood-fire and separate entrance through French-doors works as a parents retreat, Airbnb, accommodation for guests or a dual occupancy situation.
Tasmanian oak floors connect this space to the further 3 bedrooms and large main bathroom with impressive standalone bath, a whole wall of storage opposite the European laundry corridors straight into the sizeable mudroom.
For me, the pièce de résistance is the super stylish kitchen with soft-close cabinetry, Caesarstone bench-tops and quality stainless steel appliances looking out to the paddocks and livestock beyond. Prep your home-grown veggies and cook conventionally or stew on the slow combustion stove.
Love it. Buy It. Live it.
Call Katie Woods on 0428 744 498 to find out how.
Insights: 450 Woori Yallock Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Brand New Luxury Living!
This spectacular, state of the art architecturally designed home offers outstanding craftsmanship and cutting edge design for the very best of stylish living.
Nestled amongst tranquil native bushland, this new 4 bedroom home rests on just over a third of an acre of landscaped gardens and is set over two levels.
Constructed by the owner/builder to the highest standards, the sealed driveway and the grand entrance provides a taste of the stylish living that awaits. The flowing floorplan features polished Brush Box timber flooring, 9 ceilings and large double glazed windows that picture frame the lush views surrounding this home, all creating an abundance of light and space.
The upper level contains the bedroom zone with 4 spacious robed bedrooms, a study area and a large retreat zone with glass balustrade providing an unobstructed view of the central hub downstairs and out through to the superb backdrop of soft tree tops surrounding this home. The magnificent Master bedroom features a large walk in robe, contemporary ensuite and uninhibited views.
Downstairs sophisticated style continues with impressive vertical timber slates creating a feature wall that separates the main living area from the media room. The immaculate open plan living, dining and sparkling kitchen space provides yet another place for friends and family to gather.
The showcase kitchen incorporates high end features that any cook would appreciate - stone top benches, Bosch double oven, Bosch cooktop, deep island bench and a large butlers pantry.
This central hub connects cleverly to the enticing covered outdoor entertaining deck which takes in amazing views and the tranquil sounds of nature. This is the perfect place to take deep breaths and feel the stresses of life melt away.
A huge laundry with built-in benches and storage continues the modern tones enjoyed throughout, as does a convenient powder room.
Outstanding from start to finish, zoned gas ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling and internal access to a large double garage are just some of the inclusions in this true lifestyle property.
A perfect balance of sophisticated style in a quiet serene location provides all you require for a life in perfect balance.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
NOTHING BETTER THAN A BEAUTIFUL VERANDAH
This character laden timber home is beautifully appointed and is blessed with lovely morning sun, wonderful natural light and a stunning treed outlook. Add to this a quiet location with a forest at the end of the street its the lifestyle youve been searching for. Featuring 3 bedrooms, a lounge/dining with high vaulted ceilings, contemporary chefs kitchen, spacious modern bathroom, laundry, amazing attic space, wide verandah perfect for balmy summer evenings or Sunday breakfast. The circular driveway leads to plenty of parking and a double garage, you can park at the top and easily pop the kids and shopping straight into the house, no steps! The 1/2-acre allotment has been tiered and has plenty of flat useable space for the children to play, youll find they even like the verandah to play or ride their bikes around rain, hail or shine. Located within walking distance to Cockatoo Township this wonderful property should be right on the top of your list. Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 if you would like to arrange a viewing.

Description:
A HOME TO LOVE AND A SHED TO ENJOY
Highly set on a usable block of 940m2 approx. is this stunning home that has been lovingly maintained and updated by the current owners.
Boasting an open plan kitchen with quality stainless appliances, an abundance of bench space and dishwasher while overlooking the meals and lounge area. Large windows allow plenty of natural light to flow through and provides a peaceful view over the front garden. There are 3 bedrooms with 2 offering built in robes and all serviced by the freshly renovated family bathroom.
Special features include gas ducted heating, split system cooling, quality flooring throughout and a fresh coat of paint.
Outdoor entertaining is made a breeze with the oversized, covered deck area ensuring year-round comfort and allowing for the indoor-outdoor lifestyle youve been craving.
The 7x9m shed with concrete floor and power boasts the flexibility for a tradesman to work from home or enough space to store your toys and create the ultimate man cave.
The rear yard is fully fenced and provides lawn area for your four-legged friends to roam while the kids play in the cubby or learn to grow their own veggies in the raised vegetable gardens.
The home is positioned in a quite pocket of Cockatoo, although walking distance to the primary school, public transport and main street boasting brand new supermarket opening soon, doctors, cafes and restaurants.
Homes such as these dont last long, so call today to secure your inspection!

Description:
Home Sweet Home!
Located in a leafy area close to Cockatoo township is this well presented family home. This neat home is set on an elevated position and has 3 bedrooms and a spacious flat backyard. The family room has a cosy wood fire heater for added ambience and glass sliding doors that open out to covered rear entertaining area. The kitchen has ample bench space and is connected to the meals area where family and friends can gather to enjoy a meal together. All three bedrooms are robed and are serviced by a large family bathroom. Gas ducted heating will ensure the whole home is kept warm in the cooler months. Outside the home has low maintenance gardens and a very comfortable covered outdoor entertaining area with a built in pizza oven which makes entertaining easy any time of the year. The rear yard includes a garden shed and the kids will have plenty of fun in the purpose built sandpit and cubby house. Conveniently close to Cockatoo shops, schools, pre-schools and parkland this family home is well worth an inspection.

Description:
Absolute Privacy On 3.5 Acres!
Located at the end of a no through road is this very private and peaceful 3.5 acres. Surrounded by bushland, the only sounds you will hear are those of nature.
Travel the long sealed driveway over the natural flowing Cockatoo creek up to the home. Situated on an elevated position, providing picturesque views of the surrounding bushland, is this spacious and newly renovated 3 bedroom home. The large verandah entry welcome you to this home which has plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy.
Timber lined cathedral ceilings, large windows, neutral tones and modern flooring give a wonderful sense of space and light to this home. The contemporary kitchen with its white cupboard doors and contrasting black benchtops will entice the home chef to whip up a treat for friends and family to enjoy in the dining area. Family space is optimised with two separate living areas, large walk through study and 3 bedrooms, the Master also with an ensuite.
Climate comfort will be assured with a wood fire heater and three split systems.
Relax on the covered elevated deck which provides sensational views of the surrounding gardens full of majestic trees and soft tree ferns. Sit back and enjoy your favourite drink while the native birdlife provide a chorus of song.
Outside the features continue with a large double carport, a single shed with concrete floor & power, large turning space and parking area for additional vehicles or trailers. This home has 5kw of solar power, landscaped gardens and even a dam filled with Redfin and yabbies anyone for fishing?
To enjoy this unique home on this magnificent property with bush surroundings call today.

Description:
The Botanical Gardens of Cockatoo
You could be mistaken for thinking you'd stumbled across a secret botanic garden. Seeing is believing with this dual access, ¾ of an acre flat block and entry level or downsize home. Bliss out and connect with your best self, surrounded by nature. Situated within walking distance to the new supermarket, you can take the path across the creek and through the fantastic Alma Treloar reserve playground.
The sun drenched front garden landscaped with natives, is the perfect place for the children to take their first steps or play in the sandpit. Adults can enjoy evenings around the fire pit or watching the sunset through the trees from the veranda with bistro blinds.
Charming double front doors welcome you into this solid brick home. Entirely renovated with the beauty of the natural world mirrored in the finishes. The contemporary kitchen features concrete benchtops, stainless steel appliances and an island bench. The lounge area is the perfect place to retreat to when the nights draw in.
The master bedroom with BIR allows you to soak up the beauty of the gums and tree ferns. Sunshine illuminates the single bedroom with BIR. The third bedroom is accessed off the veranda and would also make a perfect studio or study. From every window the garden calls to you.
The backyard is fully fenced and full of delights including a pristine forest with local wildflowers. Gardeners will delight in the large vegetable patch and orchard with three bay compost system. There is an abundance of fruit trees; olives, mulberry, apricots, and cherries. A rainbow of rhododendrons give a continual show through the spring. The attractive wooden workshop contains a blacksmith forge offering you a surprising chance to take up a new hobby.
Come and forge your future at the open day.
